definitions.definition: To survey ; to look broadly over.
examples: Before I tackle the question directly, I must briefly review historical approaches to the problem.

definitions.definition: To write a critical evaluation of a new art work etc.; to write a review.
examples: The critic reviews every new play in London.

definitions.definition: To look back over in order to correct or edit ; to revise .
To look over again (something previously written or learned), especially in preparation for an examination .
To view or see again; to look back on.
To retrace; to go over again.

main_definition: To survey ; to look broadly over.
secondary_definitions: To write a critical evaluation of a new art work etc.; to write a review.
To look back over in order to correct or edit ; to revise .
( transitive , Canada , US , Philippines ) To look over again (something previously written or learned), especially in preparation for an examination .
( obsolete ) To view or see again; to look back on.
( obsolete ) To retrace; to go over again.
